text:
pratiqShThAM ~MvEdaq pratyEqva ti#ShThatiq yadAjya#muqcCiShyE#taq tasmi#n brahmaudaqnaM pa#cEqt taM brA$hmaqNAScaqtvAraqH prASnI#yurEqSha vA aqgnirvai$SvAnaqrO yadbrA$hmaqNa EqShA Kaluq vA aqgnEH priqyA 
taqnUryad-vai$SvAnaqraH priqyAyA#mEqvainA$M taqnuvAqM prati# ShThApayatiq cata#srO dhEqnUrda#dyAqt tABi#rEqva yaja#mAnOq&muShmi#n ~MlOqkE$&gniM du#hE || 12
(upaiq - tAM - dhArA#yaiq - ShaTca#tvAri(gm)Sacca) (A3)
